id="Delete_Record"/></labels><css><cssitem location="inline" name="NewPageStyles" cachelocation="false">.sk-button-action {
    margin: 0 0 4px -4px;
}
/* Overide pop up title bar styles*/
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar {
    margin: 30px;
    position: relative;
    color: #333333;
    font-weight:bold;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding-bottom:12px;
    padding-left:0px;
    padding-top:0px;
    border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(153, 153, 153)
}
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar .ui-button.ui-dialog-titlebar-close .ui-icon {
    color: #999999;
}
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar .ui-button.ui-dialog-titlebar-close {
    margin: 0.4em -0.1em;
    padding:0;
}
.cc-profile-popup-wrapper {
    padding-top:30px;
    padding-right:20px;
}
/* Overide rich text editor heights*/
.cc-profile-rich-text .nx-richtext-input {
    height: 183px;
}</cssitem><cssitem location="inline" name="newcss" cachelocation="false">/*

var calculateCost = function(){


    value1 = (field.model.getFieldValue(field.row,'Event_Edition_Form__c',true) || 0);
  value2= ucModelRow.User_Form_Action__c;


    field.model.updateRow(


        field.row,


        'User_Form_Action__c',


        value2


    );



    if (field.mode == 'edit') {


        field.element.find('input').val(value);


    }


};



calculateCost();



var listener = new skuid.ui.Field(field.row,field.model,null,{fieldId: 'User_Form_Action__c'});


listener.handleChange = function(){


    calculateCost();


};


field.model.registerField(listener,'Event_Edition_Form__c');

 </jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="newSnippet" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="rowAction" cachelocation="false">/*
    Row action snippet that perform the same funtionality as row when click on the name field. 
    This snippet is called on field level
*/
var ROW_ACTION_ICON = 'sk-icon-attachment-view';
var field = arguments[0],
    value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]),
    $ = skuid.$;

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value);
// If we're NOT in edit mode, then have the "link" action show a popup
if (field.mode !== 'edit') {
    if (ROW_ACTION_ICON) {
        field.element.find('a').attr('href','#').on('click',function(){
            var closestTr = field.element.closest('tr');
            var tds = closestTr.children('td');
            var actionsCell;
            if (tds.length) {
                if (tds.first().find('input[type="checkbox"]').length) {
                    actionsCell = tds[1];
                } else {
                    actionsCell = tds[0];
                }
            }
            if (actionsCell) {
                var rowAction = $(actionsCell).find('.'+ROW_ACTION_ICON);
                if (rowAction) {
                    // Trigger the click action
                    rowAction.click();
                }
            }
        });
    }
}

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="upateUFAStatusAfterUCRecordDelete" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

    row = arguments[0].row;
    var userActionFormID = arguments[0].item.row.User_Form_Action__c;
    console.log(userActionFormID);
    var modelUFA = skuid.model.getModel('UserActionForm');
    var rowsToUpdate = {}; 
    for (var i =0; i<modelUFA.data.length;i++)
    {
        console.log('userActionFormID before   '+modelUFA.data[i].Id);
        if (userActionFormID==modelUFA.data[i].Id){
            console.log('userActionFormID   '+modelUFA.data[i].Id);
            rowsToUpdate[modelUFA.data[i].Id] = { Status__c: 'Pending',Is_Filled_Up__c: false};
        }
    }
    modelUFA.updateRows( rowsToUpdate );
    modelUFA.save();
